animeTitle: Starting With a Reward of 100 Million Lives
otherNames: Starting With a Reward of 100 Million Lives, Beginning With 100 Million Lives as the Rewards, Kaiju Jiangli Yi Yi Tiao Ming, Kāijú Jiǎnglì Yī Yì Tiáo Mìng, Opening Bonus of 100 Million Lives, 开局奖励一亿条命
synopsis: Transcending to a mysterious world, Jiang Cheng gained 100 million lives at the beginning. As long as he's killed, he could resurrect and gain the random abilities to defeat the opponent. From then on, all he hoped for was to be killed. "Brother, come and kill me!" "Kill me!" Opponent boss: Jiang Cheng, you little jerk, since you're courting death eagerly, I'll satisfy you! [Ding, host, you resurrect...]
